short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a extension for easy implementation of screen sharing for WebRTC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By using the extension,  you can easily perform Screen sharing of WebRTC.
Askbe is a skill sharing platform.
Your goodness is useful to someone.
What you know leads to something that someone wants to know.
Let's publish your lesson, teaching materials using video chat, screen sharing!
https://askbe.net/
